p: In this study, adult male ICR mice (40–60 g) were used. The mice were housed in a room maintained at 25 ± 2°C on a 12 h light/dark cycle. All experiments were carried out according to the guidelines of the Institute of Animals for Scientific Purposes Development Chemicals (IAD). Animal ethics no. 620104001 was approved by the Lab Animal Research Center, University of Phayao.
